about_the_game:
About this Content
The RAID: World War II Official Soundtrack will make you travel back in time. To a granduer time when bravery and guts mattered and when Europe was in ruins. Back to wartime, when four rogue raiders went ballistic and did what they could to stop the war and get rich while doing so.

The RAID: World War II Official Soundtrack contains all the epic tracks from the game in one big bundle.

Including:
The RAID: World War II Official Soundtrack also unlocks the Marching Mace ingame!

Credits

The entire soundtrack is composed by Lion game Lion composer Ivan Selak:

Upon composing the soundtrack I finally got a chance to create music that influenced me in my career. I grew up watching the same war movies as my fellow colleagues at Lion game Lion, so the inspiration was already there.

Doing research and really travelling back to that time was amazing, and I got to work both with majestic horns as well as mellow and melancholy strings.

It truly has been a great journey. A journey I’m glad I took.

Ivan Selak, Zagreb 2017
